020
021import net.tnemc.core.config.MainConfig;
022import net.tnemc.core.transaction.Receipt;
023
024import java.util.ArrayList;
025import java.util.List;
026import java.util.Optional;
027import java.util.TreeMap;
028import java.util.UUID;
029import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
030import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap;
031import java.util.stream.Collectors;
032
033/**
034 * Manages receipts for transactions. Provides methods to add, retrieve, and remove receipts by
035 * their UUID, time, and within specific time ranges.
036 *
037 * @author creatorfromhell
038 * @see Receipt
039 * @since 0.1.3.0
040 */
041public class ReceiptManager {
042
043  private final ConcurrentMap<UUID, Receipt> receipts = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
044
045  /**
046   * Adds a new receipt to the manager.
047   *
048   * @param receipt The receipt to be added.
049   */
050  public void log(final Receipt receipt) {
051
052    if(MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Transactions.Record")) {
053
054      receipts.put(receipt.getId(), receipt);
055    }
056  }
057
058  /**
059   * Retrieves a receipt by its UUID.
060   *
061   * @param id The UUID of the receipt.
062   *
063   * @return The receipt with the specified UUID, or null if not found.
064   */
065  public Optional<Receipt> getReceiptByUUID(final UUID id) {
066
067    return Optional.ofNullable(receipts.get(id));
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * Retrieves receipts involving a specific transaction participant.
072   *
073   * @param participantUUID The UUID of the transaction participant.
074   *
075   * @return A list of receipts that involve the specified participant.
076   */
077  public List<Receipt> getReceiptsByParticipant(final UUID participantUUID) {
078
079    return receipts.values().stream()
080            .filter(receipt->(receipt.getFrom() != null && receipt.getFrom().getId().equals(participantUUID)) ||
081                             (receipt.getTo() != null && receipt.getTo().getId().equals(participantUUID)))
082            .collect(Collectors.toList());
083  }
084
085  /**
086   * Retrieves receipts by their time.
087   *
088   * @param time The time of the receipts.
089   *
090   * @return A list of receipts that occurred at the specified time.
091   */
092  public List<Receipt> getReceiptByTime(final long time) {
093
094    return receipts.values().stream()
095            .filter(receipt->receipt.getTime() == time)
096            .collect(Collectors.toList());
097  }
098
099  /**
100   * Retrieves receipts that occurred between two time periods.
101   *
102   * @param startTime The start time of the range.
103   * @param endTime   The end time of the range.
104   *
105   * @return A TreeMap where the key is the receipt time and the value is the Receipt object.
106   */
107  public TreeMap<Long, Receipt> getReceiptsBetweenTimes(final long startTime, final long endTime) {
108
109    return receipts.values().stream()
110            .filter(receipt->receipt.getTime() >= startTime && receipt.getTime() <= endTime)
111            .collect(Collectors.toMap(Receipt::getTime, receipt->receipt, (e1, e2)->e1, TreeMap::new));
112  }
113
114  /**
115   * Retrieves receipts by their time and a transaction participant UUID.
116   *
117   * @param time            The time of the receipts.
118   * @param participantUUID The UUID of the transaction participant.
119   *
120   * @return A list of receipts that occurred at the specified time and involve the specified
121   * participant.
122   */
123  public List<Receipt> getReceiptsByTimeAndParticipant(final long time, final UUID participantUUID) {
124
125    return receipts.values().stream()
126            .filter(receipt->receipt.getTime() == time &&
127                             (receipt.getFrom() != null && receipt.getFrom().getId().equals(participantUUID) ||
128                              receipt.getTo() != null && receipt.getTo().getId().equals(participantUUID)))
129            .collect(Collectors.toList());
130  }
131
132  /**
133   * Retrieves receipts that occurred between two time periods and involve a specific transaction
134   * participant.
135   *
136   * @param startTime       The start time of the range.
137   * @param endTime         The end time of the range.
138   * @param participantUUID The UUID of the transaction participant.
139   *
140   * @return A TreeMap where the key is the receipt time and the value is the Receipt object.
141   */
142  public TreeMap<Long, Receipt> getReceiptsBetweenTimesAndParticipant(final long startTime, final long endTime, final UUID participantUUID) {
143
144    return receipts.values().stream()
145            .filter(receipt->receipt.getTime() >= startTime && receipt.getTime() <= endTime &&
146                             (receipt.getFrom() != null && receipt.getFrom().getId().equals(participantUUID) ||
147                              receipt.getTo() != null && receipt.getTo().getId().equals(participantUUID)))
148            .collect(Collectors.toMap(Receipt::getTime, receipt->receipt, (e1, e2)->e1, TreeMap::new));
149  }
150
151  /**
152   * Removes a receipt by its UUID.
153   *
154   * @param id The UUID of the receipt to be removed.
155   *
156   * @return true if the receipt was removed, false otherwise.
157   */
158  public boolean removeReceiptByUUID(final UUID id) {
159
160    return receipts.remove(id) != null;
161  }
162
163  /**
164   * Removes receipts by their time.
165   *
166   * @param time The time of the receipts to be removed.
167   *
168   * @return A list of receipts that were removed.
169   */
170  public List<Receipt> removeReceiptsByTime(final long time) {
171
172    final List<Receipt> removedReceipts = getReceiptByTime(time);
173    for(final Receipt receipt : removedReceipts) {
174      receipts.remove(receipt.getId());
175    }
176    return removedReceipts;
177  }
178
179  /**
180   * Removes receipts that occurred between two time periods.
181   *
182   * @param startTime The start time of the range.
183   * @param endTime   The end time of the range.
184   *
185   * @return A list of receipts that were removed.
186   */
187  public List<Receipt> removeReceiptsBetweenTimes(final long startTime, final long endTime) {
188
189    final List<Receipt> removedReceipts = new ArrayList<>(getReceiptsBetweenTimes(startTime, endTime).values());
190    for(final Receipt receipt : removedReceipts) {
191      receipts.remove(receipt.getId());
192    }
193    return removedReceipts;
194  }
195
196  /**
197   * Removes receipts by their time and a transaction participant UUID.
198   *
199   * @param time            The time of the receipts.
200   * @param participantUUID The UUID of the transaction participant.
201   *
202   * @return A list of receipts that were removed.
203   */
204  public List<Receipt> removeReceiptsByTimeAndParticipant(final long time, final UUID participantUUID) {
205
206    final List<Receipt> removedReceipts = getReceiptsByTimeAndParticipant(time, participantUUID);
207    for(final Receipt receipt : removedReceipts) {
208      receipts.remove(receipt.getId());
209    }
210    return removedReceipts;
211  }
212
213  /**
214   * Removes receipts that occurred between two time periods and involve a specific transaction
215   * participant.
216   *
217   * @param startTime       The start time of the range.
218   * @param endTime         The end time of the range.
219   * @param participantUUID The UUID of the transaction participant.
220   *
221   * @return A list of receipts that were removed.
222   */
223  public List<Receipt> removeReceiptsBetweenTimesAndParticipant(final long startTime, final long endTime, final UUID participantUUID) {
224
225    final List<Receipt> removedReceipts = new ArrayList<>(getReceiptsBetweenTimesAndParticipant(startTime, endTime, participantUUID).values());
226    for(final Receipt receipt : removedReceipts) {
227      receipts.remove(receipt.getId());
228    }
229    return removedReceipts;
230  }
231
232  public ConcurrentMap<UUID, Receipt> getReceipts() {
233
234    return receipts;
235  }
236}
